definitions.definition: To lay carpet, or to have carpet installed , in an area.
examples: After the fire, they carpeted over the blackened hardwood flooring.
The builders were carpeting in the living room when Zadie inspected her new house.

definitions.definition: To substantially cover something, as a carpet does; to blanket something.
examples: Popcorn and candy wrappers carpeted the floor of the cinema.

main_definition: To lay carpet, or to have carpet installed , in an area.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To substantially cover something, as a carpet does; to blanket something.
